chart_description: This chart displays the system CPU time used by user processes. The chart is expressed in percentage.

dimension_descriptions.1000: The CPU ID associated with the dimension.
dimension_descriptions.1001: The process ID associated with the dimension.
dimension_descriptions.65532: The system interrupt generated by the kernel associated with the dimension.
dimension_descriptions.81: The system call generated by the kernel associated with the dimension.
dimension_descriptions.messagebus: The D-Bus message bus associated with the dimension.
dimension_descriptions.netdata: The Netdata monitoring daemon process associated with the dimension.
dimension_descriptions.nobody: The nobody user associated with the dimension.
dimension_descriptions.nut: The Network UPS Tools daemon process associated with the dimension.
dimension_descriptions.root: The root user associated with the dimension.
dimension_descriptions.systemd-coredump: The systemd core dump process associated with the dimension.
dimension_descriptions.xfs: The XFS file system daemon process associated with the dimension.
